Eligibility:
(Article 1)
- **Criteria for eligibility:**
  - Must have a permanent or fixed-term contract, either full-time or part-time.
  - Job must allow partial and regular remote work.
  - Sufficient autonomy to perform tasks without close managerial support.
  - No need for specific non-IT equipment.
  - Must not disrupt team or service operations.
  - Availability and proficiency in necessary IT tools.
  - Home and secondary telework locations must be suitable, with proper electrical setup and high-speed internet.
  - Must provide proof of home insurance covering telework and electrical compliance.

### F
Frequency:
(Article 2, 6.1 & 6.4)
- **Full-time employees:**
  - Up to 3 days of telework per week.
  - Up to 5 days per week if living more than 200 km from the office.
  - Telework not allowed on Mondays to maintain team cohesion.
- **Part-time employees:**
  - Must be present at the office for at least two full days per week.
  - Not required to be present on Mondays.

### A
Arrangements:
(Article 2, 6.1)
- **Establishing telework:**
  - Telework days must be agreed upon with the manager.
  - Fixed and identical telework days for each employee.
  - Telework days can be rescheduled with prior notice and manager approval.
  - Telework cannot be a reason to miss mandatory in-person activities.
  - Telework can be temporarily suspended or modified by the manager or employee.
